destinations.name: Mumbai

places_to_visit.name: Gateway of India
places_to_visit.info: An iconic landmark overlooking the Arabian Sea.

places_to_visit.name: Marine Drive
places_to_visit.info: A scenic promenade along the coast.

travel_tips: Carry a water bottle to stay hydrated.
Beware of pickpockets in crowded areas.
safety_tips: Avoid isolated areas late at night.
Keep your belongings close in crowded places.
destinations.accessibility: Most tourist spots are accessible for people with disabilities, with ramps and special facilities available.

destinations.cultural_etiquette: Respect local customs, such as removing shoes before entering temples.
destinations.weather_overview: Mumbai has a tropical climate with high humidity. Monsoons are from June to September.
